feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.0 : Record reorder & Insert anywhere
entry.content:
ğŸš€ NocoDB : Feature Release

Weâ€™re excited to introduce Record Re-order & Insert Anywhere in NocoDB!

Drag-and-Drop to Reorder Records: Easily organize your records by dragging and dropping them within the grid. Whether you're prioritizing tasks, arranging items, or customizing views, you now have the freedom to structure your data just the way you need.

Insert New Record Anywhere: Adding new records is more intuitive than ever. Use the Insert Above and Insert Below options in the record context menu to place new entries exactly where they belong, saving time and reducing manual adjustments.

These powerful enhancements give you full control over your data, allowing for smoother workflows, better organization, and improved usability when working with large datasets.

ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Update website footer year to 2025 #10177
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Auto Upstall fails Docker installation on Amazon Linux #10160
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Unable to Directly Add a Record to an External Database #9490
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Multi field editor - show system fields #9264
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Year formula for date fields #8721
  • [closed] [Enhancement] add the function of "number format options" under the rollup column #5312
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Drag and Drop Rows #4748
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Share View - Custom URL/Custom UUID #3963

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.11 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10149
  • chore: add optimize deps by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10141
  • chore: add missing py3-setuptools dep by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10151
  • docs: mark personal view as cloud only by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10152
  • fix: avoid decrypting global integration by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10153
  • feat(nc-gui): Multi field editor - show system fields by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10086
  • feat(nc-gui): number format options for rollup column by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10088
  • Node 22 docker build issue by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10155
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10150
  • feat: record reorder wip by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10058
  • Fix: Fields menu improvement by @yooneskh in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10135
  • Nc fix add lookup by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10163
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10157
  • Upstall script - add worker service for ee edition by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10164
  • fix(nc-gui): prevent loading column hash in public or localMode by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10165
  • Upstall script: remove duplicate service prop by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10166
  • Sync master with develop brach by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10158
  • feat: enable i18n in ee by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10162
  • fix(nc-gui): form view logo alignment issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10167
  • Fix: update data overwrites the insert data in grid by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10156
  • fix: use proper reference for related model id by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10170
  • feat: year fn for formula by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10171
  • Nc fix: i18n menu items by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10169
  • Include wget in docker runner by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10174
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10175
  • Nc fix/custom url follow up by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10180
  • Nc feat/custom url support for shared view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9871
  • fix: mysql reorder fixes by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10172
  • fix(nc-gui): delete unused file by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10183
  • chore: new icons by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10179
  • docs: reorder by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10184
  • fix(nc-gui): form view / attachment / currency issues by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10168
  • fix(nc-gui): disable fieldsMenu add new field and show/hide all field switch in locked view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10182
  • 0.260.0 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10186

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.258.11...0.260.0

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Clarification on Adding New i18n Keys and Synchronization Across Language JSON Files #10204
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook not Triggering after Update #10201
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: AVG() not working as expected it does a ADD() on lookup fields. #10200
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: SUBSTR function with DateTime Field does not work correctly #10197
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot Access NocoDB after Installation via Coolify #10191
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Failed to duplicate base #7428

What's Changed

  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10188
  • fix(nc-gui): record editor and calendar fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10181
  • Revert to Node.js 18 due to lack of pkg support for Node.js 22 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10189
  • Nc fix/import data new UI by @yooneskh in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10161
  • Revert to Node.js 18 due to lack of pkg support for Node.js 22 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10190
  • Print correct app url on init based on env by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10198
  • fix: add missing pks by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10193
  • chore: AI features follow up by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10208
  • chore(nc-gui): lint by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10209
  • fix: suppress not valid json errors by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10207
  • better language name by @lmalma in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10196
  • Update chinese.md by @bestlaw66 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10054
  • Nc refactor/rich text by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10224
  • fix: monospace font issue by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10225
  • fix: duplicate fails if there is an invalid formula or button by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10214
  • fix: job with empty data by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10232
  • chore: enable shutdown hooks by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10229

New Contributors

  • @bestlaw66 made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10054

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.0...0.260.1

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Error executing webhook: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'workspace_id') #10268
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: unable to deploy nocodb frontend url on remote srver #10262
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: #10261
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: NOCODB + OpenID Connect for education/non-commercial #10253
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Has Many Link - Add new record error: "Update not allowed for table which doesn't have primary Key" #10249
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Not sure if this is a bug or missing feature but in the New UI there is no global Audit #10238
  • [closed] Edit Access after selecting Share #10205
  • [ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot login after a fresh start #10125
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: database audit missing #10101
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: adding a new mysql data source requires db user with create database permission #9990

  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Modification History Tracking #9549
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Investigate bulk update #9117
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Bulk update is not shown in the audit log. #8964
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Updates Committed to Data Source while being keyed in but before being committed to NocoDB #5895
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Improve audit logs to properly show REST API calls #2030

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10242

  • fix: accessibility issues by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10248
  • fix: long text data disappear by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10256
  • fix(nc-gui): grid row visibility issue in mobile view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10257
  • test(extension-marketplace): marketplace test funcs by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9966
  • fix: fields menu reload by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10259
  • fix: upload modal data only headers by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10258
  • fix: dynamic ref by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10240
  • feat(nc-gui): New Barcode/QR Code UI/UX by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10254
  • fix: Mark as new record while creating new record from links list by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10265
  • chore: nc sync by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10218
  • Nc refactor(nc-gui): RichText follow up by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10251

  • fix: fix searching the linked records of a new record in expanded/form by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10250
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10270
  • fix: avoid create db call on connect existing external by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10267
  • fix: properly null check for apiMeta by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10244
  • Fix: Misc Issues by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10269
  • fix: Webhook log insertion bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10272

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.5: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: DATESTR function is not available for your database #10377
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Data deletion bug when filtering and selecting all records #10375
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field. #10374
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: NocoDB not starting after update to latest version #10355
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: lookup field are limited to 25 ! #10354
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: hash mismatch in Nix build #10339
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: MySQL as ExtSource- Allow using text instead of set when using select fields #10338
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Deserialization Error on Minio plugin - fresh upstall #10332
  • [closed] Free Vulnerability Code Review for Your GitHub Repository #10327
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Installation script fails to retrieve external IP address due to HTML response from ifconfig.co #10320
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Rename table #10313
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Option to Enable Paginated View #10292
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'findIndex') - error updating a linked field in the kanban view #10283
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook is sent out of date. #10281
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Disorder in hidden fields on kanban cards. #10276
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Meta sync not working for postgres db integration #10255
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Link field API response issue #10222
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Can't use "field summary" in a "group by" view #10221
  • [closed] cannot create source via api #10178
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Roll-up sum of formula #10144
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot use OVH S3 Plugin: "Invalid Region: region was not a valid dns name" #9942
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Question mark isn't automatically escaped in REGEX_EXTRACT #9847
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Formula to linked formula which is primary #9812
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Delete Webhook Payload only visible Columns #9778
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook doesnt fire when a relation gets updated #9763
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'date_format') while update external PG table #9731
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Support the import of CSV files with non-UTF-8 encodings. #9634
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: difference between time field is in JSON format #9511
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: "T is not iterable" when trying to delete records #9307
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Introduce Bulk Delete button for attachment fields #9282
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: record audit logs as date and time instead of "days and hours ago" #9106
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Inquiry about the completeness and openness of the nc-help library #9012
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Many-to-many relationships are not deleted when deleting a record #8366
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Adding rows in middle of the table #8196
  • [ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ› Bug: copy record url in detail view not working #7117
  • [ğŸ‘‹ For : Community or Good First Issue] Doesn't create relations from Postgresql DB #719
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Button open url with dynamic url based on attachment field #10419
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Drag Indicator in Single-Select and Multi-Select is scrambled #10409
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Editor shouldn't be able to modify form schema #10360
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot HEAD /dashboard #10337
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Minio endpoint name can't have underscore #10334
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Column name changes after using SingleSelect #8606
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: csv upload into field set to duration fails #8358
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Allow rollup also for linked formula fields #7975
  • [ğŸ“ Status: Need Internal Discussion] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Enable LTAR #7053
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Allow using values from has-many child tables in webhooks #4481
  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement][ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Use Formula result in Rollup #3014
  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement][ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Use rollup in formula #1331
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› [Import CSV] Bug: Script error : "cannot read properties of undefined" when using pagination #1297
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸš˜ Scope : Automation] Feature : log automations #313

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10396
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10397
  • Update runner os to ubuntu-22.04 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10399

  • 0.260.4 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10401
  • Release 0.260.4 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10402
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10403
  • chore(github/workflow/bumper): switch to the new nix runner by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10405
  • chore(github/workflow/bumper): fixes by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10408
  • fix: Add help text for hostname error in Minio by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10412
  • Nc hook logs by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10404
  • fix: avoid lazy loading of typeable editor cell component by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10416
  • fix: mask creds on get by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10361
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10413
  • Nc data audit enable by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10426
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10427
  • fix: Include foreign key if system fields is enabled at view level by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10414
  • fix: support japanese, chinese and cryillic letters by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10428
  • fix : escape parentheses on filter from API by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10415
  • 0.260.5 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10430

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.6: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Filter by date not working after update to 0.260.5 #10447
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: realtime updating #10440
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: cannot use search by fields with Russian names #10439
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: null doesn't work #10438
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field #10424
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: log in page of app.nocodb.com is blank #9552

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.5 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10431
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10432
  • fix internationalization by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10434
  • fix: Add whitespace support in where query param parser by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10436
  • fix (nocodb-sdk): Handle suboperator on logical level, more language support by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10441
  • fix: attachment null by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10444
  • fix: condition for attachment check by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10446
  • Nc fix/date filter bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10445
  • chore: bump package versions by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10437
  • Nc fix/progress meta sync by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10448
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10450
  • fix: cache calculated value by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10455
  • fix: rollback the query filter to previous implementation by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10454
  • 0.260.6 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10456

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.5...0.260.6
